findings.title: Token renaming
findings.description: The functions updateName / updateSymbol are not compliant with the ERC20 standard, which may cause investor distrust or problems with listing on an exchange.

findings.title: Token ownership can be transferred before finalization
findings.description: Transferring token ownership is possible before finalization and doing it will render the finalization function useless.

findings.title: Gas recommendations
findings.description: Optimize gas usage by using hardcoded public CONSTANT values instead of setting state variables and avoiding duplicate code.
